publicationStmt.authority: Centre for Computing in the Humanities, King's College London

availability.p: All reuse or distribution of this work must contain somewhere a link back to the URL http://inslib.kcl.ac.uk/

div.p:
To report any problems with the website please go to the following address:
https://www.kdl.kcl.ac.uk/report-issue/

To report corrections/improvements to content, please write to the Society for Libyan Studies:
gensec@societyforlibyanstudies.org
We will not be making any changes to this edition, but improvements can be noted and could inform a future edition.
